0000101110111011 1001110101000000 1 -> sum: 1010100011111100, cout: 0
1100010000111110 1110100000011000 0 -> sum: 1010110001010110, cout: 1
1000111000010001 0011111101000001 1 -> sum: 1100110101010011, cout: 0
1011000001010001 1101110011101111 1 -> sum: 1000110101000001, cout: 1
0000111110101011 1000110001010101 1 -> sum: 1001110000000001, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
